title: gOpanandana valari punutha
sahitya:
gOpanandana valaripunuta pada sArasa mAramaNA pAhi 

(gOpa)



anupallavi



tApasagEya kIrtE bhava tApavimocana mUrtE

divyahEma makuTAdivirAjita padmanAbha madhusUdana jaya jaya

(gOpa)



caraNam



pAta phAlguna harE kari paramagamAmara pAlana rucipada

sAmajAdhipa bhayahara patucarita

pIta vasana vilasita mrgamada vAta nandana lAlita padayuga

nIti sAgara yadukulavara bhava khEdanAshana navajala harasama

(gOpa)
